effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

short_effect.black_white: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

flavor_text.black_white: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
